ygData.subject: RE: Questions about the Water Crystal Staff
ygData.msgSnippet: I believe the WCS is off a Froglock/Goblin (can t remember) of about 25ish in Lake Rathe near the Aviak Village.  The SCS comes off a named Evil Eye in
ygData.messageBody:
I believe the WCS is off a Froglock/Goblin (can't remember) of about 25ish
in Lake Rathe near the Aviak Village. The SCS comes off a named Evil Eye in
Beholder though I do not remember its name either.

I bought my WCS for 80pp while I was hunting Aviaks in S. Karana, awhile ago
it was one the items of the week so they might be less now.

Last week I was lucky and traded a Glowing Stein for a Staff of Writhing & a
Shield of the Slain Unicorn. I think the Staff is the best 1h blunt you are
going to find (9/33 & 48pt Chaotic Feedback). However it seems my 24th
level wizard is not high enough to get the chaotic feedback to work
properly. I receive a message that my will is not sufficient to command the
staff. So for the short term I have banked it and switch to the WCS until I
gain a few levels.


Aljernon
24th Level Wizard

Drahkoth
8th Level Necromancer

-----Original Message-----
From: Jon Fiedler [mailto:fiedler@...]
Sent: Tuesday, August 17, 1999 1:05 PM
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Questions about the Water Crystal Staff


From: "Jon Fiedler" <fiedler@...>

Do any of you know what MOB has the Water Crystal staff? Or the Slime
Crystal Staff?

I have heard that the WCS is found in Lake Rathe on a level 20ish MOB... is
this correct? Does anyone have additional info like where he can be found?

I know nothing about the Slime Crystal Staff so any info you have would be
helpful.

I want to get a decent 1hd staff that looks interesting.

Are there any other different looking 1hd staff(or any good ones for that
matter) that a level 20 Necro (with some similar level friends if needed)
could obtain... not that I'm positive I could get either of these.

Yours in hate,
Azerin of Brell
